--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Repost:
> 
> ::Autofire/Scavenger::
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Autofire looks calmly at the weapon aimed at his chest, a smile 
playing across his lips. He was ready to dodge the blast, but he 
doubted Hovotron would fire. The yell from Domnijoe made his smile 
grow wider, but he glances annoyingly at Firestrike as the dissident 
spoke, then returning his gaze to Hovotron.

> "Interesting faction you have. Who exactly did you say was the 
commander?" Autofire asks, playing off of the uncertainty of the 
Constructicons and whatever was going on with the bot behind Hovotron. 
His smile shrinks somewhat as the Constructicons briefly form 
Devastator, but he smiles again as Devastator crumbles.
> 

> "Your troops seem to be a bit out of shape," he comments.
> 
> 



    ::DOMNIJOE AND BLINDCHAOS::

    Blindchaos, upon recieving new orders from Megatron, eagerly left 
the ship to join his comrads against Havotron. His appearance was 
quick and silent. He landed beside Soundwave with an earth thundering 
THOOM. He Transformed into his Ankylosaur format and he poised himself 
for attack should his efforts demand it. He showed no emotion upon 
seeing Devistastor fall apart.
    Domnijoe smiled at the appearance of Soundwave's cassettes and 
aimed her wrist launcher at Havotron. She hid her alarm when 
Devistator formed and quickly became relieved when he fell apart. 
Things were becomming quite ...INTERESTING!!



Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
